location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Swinton, Personal Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Swinton writes to state that a carriage and harnesses (to fit two horses) have been despatched to Ibrahim Khan, Governor of Kirman [Kerman], on board the ship Volunteer. Swinton finishes by stating that a duplicate of the letter will be delivered to Bruce by Captain Waterman of the Volunteer.
